title: White House says New Jersey drones were 'not the enemy'
shortDescription: Mysterious drones that hovered over New Jersey last month were authorized by the FAA for research and recreation purposes, the White House says.

title: Trump snaps at Jim Acosta during his first term: 'This is not happy talk'
shortDescription: During his first term, President Donald Trump repeatedly clashed with Jim Acosta and said CNN had the "worst record in the history of broadcasting."

title: Netanyahu says he will visit Trump at the White House amid ceasefire
shortDescription: President Trump said a day earlier that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu would visit 'very soon.'

title: Trump administration sued over pause in grants
shortDescription: Advocacy groups for nonprofits, health organizations for small businesses told a federal court Trump's pause in grant funding could be 'catastrophic'

title: Indiana man pardoned by Trump for Jan. 6 riots killed at traffic stop
shortDescription: A Jasper County Sheriff’s deputy shot and killed 42-year-old Matthew Huttle during a traffic stop in Indiana on Sunday, Jan. 26, 2025. Huttle was recently pardoned by President Donald Trump for his role in the 2021 U.S. Capitol riots.

title: Trump's funding pause won't impact federal student loans, Pell Grants
shortDescription: The Education Department said Tuesday that federal student loans and Pell Grants won't stop flowing to students amid a broader federal funding pause.

title: Senate confirms Sean Duffy as secretary of Transportation
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Duffy would use his past experience in Congress to help rebuild the country’s infrastructure and improve travel safety.

title: What we know about Trump's pause on federal grants, loans
shortDescription: The Trump administration memo prompted consternation in Washington about which federal government programs could expect to continue past Tuesday.

title: Michigan's Gary Peters won't run for US Senate reelection in 2026
shortDescription: Democrat Gary Peters' announcement means Michigan will have an open U.S. Senate seat for the second time in two years.

title: DOJ fires employees who worked on Trump prosecutions | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Kash Patel, Trump's pick to lead the FBI, and his role in Jan. 6 misinformation | Trump pledges sweeping tariffs on steel, semiconductors

title: President Trump's radical immigration agenda takes shape
shortDescription: On Day 1 of his presidency, Trump sought to make good on his campaign promise to curb illegal immigration.

title: Trump fires DOJ lawyers who assisted Jack Smith
shortDescription: Acting Attorney General James McHenry fired lawyers who assisted Jack Smith, saying he believes they “could not be trusted.”

title: President Trump pauses federal aid money
shortDescription: The Trump administration released a memo stating a "temporary pause" on all federal assistance activities will take affect January 28.

title: Trump says military opened water flow in Calif. State says otherwise
shortDescription: Donald Trump said the U.S. military entered California and opened a large flow of water to fight fires, but state officials denied those claims.

title: White House pauses federal grants and loans
shortDescription: The Trump administration has temporarily paused grant, loan and other financial assistance programs, according to a memo.

title: Trump exec order IDs two sexes. Advocates see that as a threat.
shortDescription: Trump's Inauguration Day executive order declared there are just two sexes. Now, 170 groups say that endangers transgender, others.

title: President Trump wants iron dome for US
shortDescription: While speaking to House Republicans in Miami, President Donald Trump says he is ordering the construction of an Iron Dome-style air defense system.

title: Trump vows sweeping tariffs on steel, semiconductors and other goods
shortDescription: President Trump said in the "very near future" he will impose tariffs on steel, aluminum, copper, semiconductors, pharmaceuticals and other imports.

title: Trump touts 'political earthquake' in speech to House Republicans
shortDescription: The speech kicks off Republicans' House issues conference held at Trump's property in Miami.

title: White House releases Melania Trump's official portrait
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump released an official portrait Monday, a week after her husband Donald Trump was sworn as the 47th President.

title: Senate confirms Bessent as Treasury secretary
shortDescription: Bessent, 62, is a longtime hedge fund manager, Trump donor and adviser. He'll be the point person for Trump on a host of key economic issues.

title: Indiana deputy fatally shoots Jan. 6 rioter pardoned by President Trump
shortDescription: Matthew Huttle was among more than 1,500 people pardoned by President Donald Trump stemming from the Capitol attack Jan. 6, 2021.

title: Trump calls on Voight, Stallone and Gibson to be 'Special Ambassadors' to Hollywood
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has appointed Jon Voight, Sylvester Stallone, and Mel Gibson as his “eyes and ears” in Hollywood.

title: California wildfires: Trump issues wide-reaching water order
shortDescription: Donald Trump signed a wide-ranging executive order demanding federal and state officials deliver more water and other resources to southern California.

title: Justice Department fires officials who investigated Trump
shortDescription: The acting attorney general fired more than a dozen officials who assisted special counsel Jack Smith's prosecutions against President Donald Trump.
